Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Gemma V. Geluz
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best things I've ever bought. I love this camera and am having so much fun with it.

Reviews.Title: Battery Lasts!
Reviews.Author: J. Fitzpatrick "Jim"
Reviews.Content: 'Toy' Camera in the sense that it is a barebones camera and has limited pixels. In this sense it is a tiny digital cousin of the Lomo film cameras.Pictures tend to be over saturated or bleached out. But that is part of its charm: you never quite know what you get until you enlarge it in your digital processor.I travel with 2 cameras, my Canon S100 and this little Chinon -- and when I'm really traveling light, I usually limit myself to the Chinon…. Just don't expect Pro results….

Reviews.Title: More than I expected!
Reviews.Author: hanna
Reviews.Content: I so love this camera. It's more than I expected. The only thing that I can say is that the blue light indicator doesn't work when charging. I can't bother to return it as it will cost me heaps for the shipping again. But all in all, I LOVE THIS CAMERA!

Reviews.Title: Camera died within 48 hours of me receiving it
Reviews.Author: Adam Anderson
Reviews.Content: I was looking forward to buying a Digital Harinezumi for years now. I ordered the 4 this past Black Friday, and received it earlier this week. Within the first few hours of me owning the camera, the monitor filled with noise that I couldn't get rid of. The next day, I tried to turn it on again, and the monitor would turn on without showing anything on the screen. Even after recharging the battery, the camera just refuses to turn on.For the few hours that I was able to use it, I was very satisfied with the lo-fi visuals that this little camera was capable of doing.

ProductInfo.Features:
Now with MULTIPLE EXPOSURE, Double and beyond
It now charges itself (no more batteries) recharge via USB
New MACRO ultra close up shooting at 3cm
New FOG (Smoky) effect can be layered atop all of the other various filters
New 1.5" enlarged Display viewer
ProductInfo.Name: CHINON Superheadz Digital Harinezumi 4.0 Camera Black Japan
